title: CSV reader not reading all lines
body:
by **fericean**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Run the program http://play.golang.org/p/QRwQyVQV3c

What is the expected output?
I would expect that the reader to parse all line of the text variable.

What do you see instead?
It only prints the first line

If a space character is added at the end of the lines ending in ,,, the output is as
expected. Why would the space be necessary?
